intervention_catalogue.name: Managing My Emotions
intervention_catalogue.short_description: This intervention aims to improve people's ability to understand and manage their emotions to avoid offending in the future.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Learning to manage emotions is key to positive, offence-free lifestyle and healthy relationships. This intervention aims to improve people's ability to understand and manage their emotions to avoid offending in the future.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 1 x pre-group session and 6 x group sessions

risk_consideration.cn_score_guide:
Need is evidenced by at least one
of the following OASys criteria
being satisfied:
* 11.3 = 2
* Thinking and behaviour related RoSH
* Attitudes related RoSH
risk_consideration.ogrs_score_guide:
If OVP not available, then OGRS3 (over 2 years):
score 25+

special_educational_needs.exclusion_literacy_level_guide: The person you are referring must be able to read and understand simple sentences.

exclusion.remaining_license_community_order_guide: If there are less than 9 months remaining on the licence or community order, you should check with the Treatment Manager.
exclusion.alcohol_drug_problem_guide: Any alcohol or drug-related problems must be stable before attending the programme
exclusion.mental_health_problem_guide: People with mental health problems should only be excluded from the programme if the issues are acute and damage their ability to relate to others or concentrate.
exclusion.not_allowed_if_eligible_for_another_inte: The person you are referring must not be suitable for, or be unable to access an Accredited Programme.
exclusion.literacy_level: The person you are referring must be able to read and understand simple sentences.
